Uses of Package
org.apache.taverna.workflowmodel.health

  • Packages that use org.apache.taverna.workflowmodel.health 
    Package Description
    org.apache.taverna.activities.dataflow  
    org.apache.taverna.activities.stringconstant
    Contains the activity classes required in the execution of Beanshell scripts.
    org.apache.taverna.workflowmodel.health
    A package that contains a set of classes to be used in testing a Dataflow prior to invocation.
    These can carry our various tests such as a service endpoint being accessible.
  • Classes in org.apache.taverna.workflowmodel.health used by org.apache.taverna.activities.dataflow 
    Class and Description
    HealthChecker
    An SPI interface whose implementation performs a health check on an arbitrary instance.
  • Classes in org.apache.taverna.workflowmodel.health used by org.apache.taverna.activities.stringconstant 
    Class and Description
    HealthChecker
    An SPI interface whose implementation performs a health check on an arbitrary instance.
  • Classes in org.apache.taverna.workflowmodel.health used by org.apache.taverna.workflowmodel.health 
    Class and Description
    HealthCheck
    A HealthCheck is a kind of visit that determines if the corresponding object in a workflow (normally an Activity) will work during a workflow run.
    HealthChecker
    An SPI interface whose implementation performs a health check on an arbitrary instance.
